nodes.bodyText: Note that this is a bug, that should be fixed on master. DECIMAL_LITERAL cannot match any token, because it's declared with a #.
nodes.diffHunk:
@@ -62,7 +62,7 @@ protected TokenEntry processToken(Tokens tokenEntries, GenericToken currentToken
 
         if (ignoreLiterals && (javaToken.kind == JavaTokenKinds.STRING_LITERAL
                 || javaToken.kind == JavaTokenKinds.CHARACTER_LITERAL
-                || javaToken.kind == JavaTokenKinds.DECIMAL_LITERAL

nodes.bodyText: I guess, we should also add TEXT_LITERAL to this list of ignored literals. We can fix both parts with #2159 .
nodes.diffHunk:
@@ -62,7 +62,7 @@ protected TokenEntry processToken(Tokens tokenEntries, GenericToken currentToken
 
         if (ignoreLiterals && (javaToken.kind == JavaTokenKinds.STRING_LITERAL
                 || javaToken.kind == JavaTokenKinds.CHARACTER_LITERAL
-                || javaToken.kind == JavaTokenKinds.DECIMAL_LITERAL
